channel.title: Click on item in inv and it gives you items [317]

item.title: Click on item in inv and it gives you items [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

You should have a file named ClickItem.java. Add this into it.

if(itemId == 5507) { c.getItems().deleteItem(5507, 1); c.getItems().addItem(995, 50000); addItem(1323, 1); addItem(542, 1); addItem(544, 1); addItem(4587, 1); addItem(1725, 1); }

Read full topic

item.title: Click on item in inv and it gives you items [317]

item.description:
@monaiz wrote:

Hi, how do i make it where you click on a item in your inv
and it will give you more items? then that item will delete

i tried If

(ItemUsed == 5507) {
addItem(1323, 1);
addItem(542, 1);
addItem(544, 1);
addItem(4587, 1);
addItem(1725, 1);
addItem(995, 50000);
}

but didnt work
